seo.title: .NET MAUI Mobile Application: 1-Hour Briefing
seo.description: Discuss your mobile app needs and explore expert solutions to improve performance, user experience, and cross-platform compatibility.

blocks.heading: Entra ID: 1-Hour Briefing
blocks.body: Address identity and access management challenges and receive expert advice on how to enhance security, streamline access, and improve compliance using Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD).

accordionItems.label: Business Process Analysis
accordionItems.content: We analyze your organizationâ€™s current Identity and Access Management (IAM) posture. Our consultants will review your existing authentication methods, user lifecycle management, and security policies to identify vulnerabilities and areas for optimization.

accordionItems.label: Blueprint Creation
accordionItems.content: We discuss the creation of a comprehensive blueprint for your Entra ID architecture. This details the required security configurations, Conditional Access policies, Single Sign-On (SSO) integrations, and hybrid identity synchronization strategy.

accordionItems.label: Licensing and Product Recommendations
accordionItems.content: We review your current subscriptions and recommend the most cost-effective licensing tiers (e.g., Entra ID P1 vs. P2) to ensure you have the necessary features for your security goals without overspending.

accordionItems.label: Product Backlog Items with Effort/Time Estimates
accordionItems.content: We discuss building a prioritized backlog of actionable security improvements. We break these down into clear tasks, such as "Enforce MFA for all users" or "Configure Privileged Identity Management (PIM)", complete with effort and time estimates.

accordionItems.label: Implementation Roadmap
accordionItems.content: We discuss how we can build a phased roadmap for rolling out these changes. This ensures a smooth transition that minimizes user disruption while rapidly increasing your security score, moving from quick wins to long-term governance strategies.

blocks.heading: Trusted in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, and Newcastle by
The next step is a  **Specification Review**: Your Blueprint for Software Success
blocks.body: You wouldn't build a house without an architect's plan, so don't build software without a specification. We define the roadmap, mitigate risks, and provide accurate estimates before a single line of code is written.

cards.heading: The Specification Review
cards.description: Understanding a complex system takes more than one meeting. We spend time gathering stakeholder requirements to create a detailed project roadmap, ensuring we understand the destination before we start the journey.

cards.heading: Requirements Analysis
cards.description: We break down the technical landscape to define your architectural roadmap, integration plans, and deployment strategy. By identifying the MVP and potential risks early, we prevent costly bottlenecks later.

cards.heading: Product Backlog
cards.description: We translate your requirements into a tangible list of Product Backlog Items (PBIs). This includes setting priorities, mapping dependencies, and estimating the effort required to build the solution step-by-step.

cards.heading: Ballpark Estimates
cards.description: Budget clarity is essential. We provide realistic projections on the number of sprints, the size of the development team, and the estimated total cost, giving you the data you need to secure approval.

cards.heading: From Wireframes to Product
cards.description: Deep engagement ensures we solve the right problem. We move from rough wireframes to detailed UX designs and final development, keeping you in the loop until the "Definition of Done" is met.

blocks.heading: Talk to us about your **Entra ID** Rollout
blocks.description: Connect with our Account Managers to discuss how we can help.
